summary: This bill, the "Transgender Research on Animals Now Stops and Money for Ideological Cruelty Eliminated Act" (TRANS MICE Act), prohibits the use of federal funds for research on non-human vertebrates to study the effects of interventions that alter their bodies to no longer correspond to their biological sex.  It defines "covered research" and "qualified animal," and exempts animals that change sex naturally or possess both male and female reproductive organs.
